snippet.title: Suzerain Gameplay | What Would You Do As President?
snippet.description:
Prove yourself as president (and a father) in this Suzerain gameplay. What would you do as President? Suze rain is a text based RPG which is focused on politics in the 1950s. While you're here, check out our Displate store to buy a fine metal poster and help support the channel: https://displate.com/rockpapershotgun?art=5d947922ad0d0

This isn’t a Suzerain review, but instead our very early Suzerain impressions. Taking place in a fictional universe in 1954, the Republic of Sordland, you’ll see unique countries, cultures, and characters. You’ll take your character on a journey to express yourself - politically, morally, or pragmatically.  You must work to keep your allies close, and your enemies closer as anyone can turn into a foe at a moments notice. And, just like with any leader, your promises and decisions are important ones, so make sure you take the best route possible, or fear the consequences 

If you enjoyed this Suzerain gameplay why not let us know in the comments. And if you really enjoyed our Suzerain impressions, why not like and subscribe to Rock Paper Shotgun? And if you have any questions about Suzerain, pop them in the comments and we’ll try to find you some answers. Thanks to Torpor Games for joining us at the RPS Indies Uncovered at EGX Berlin where we first broadcast this video. To watch the whole stream in full - where 15 games were covered - please click here: https://youtu.be/F5Ut_f9hAtY
